messages.subject: full moon
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/30/02 7:13:30 AM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/30/02 7:13:30 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<<
I apologize for the comment. It was just a smart ass FYI. I'm sure
many don't care when the exact time of the full moon is, and I should
respect that. Please forgive me, I didn't mean to detract from your
post, it was quite good.

Stacy
>>

I guess if it was MEANT to be smart ass I understand why you're apologizing...
But I appreciated having that information, and I actually like it when people
correct information I had wrong.
So if I ever get something wrong, please fyi away!!
I actually looked up at the moon that night and told my dh the exact time of
the full moon and thought "way cool, I learned this at my e-mail list!!!
Accuracy is a good thing.
Ren
